TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CultureNotFoundException extends System.ArgumentException
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CultureNotFoundException extends System.ArgumentException implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
type CultureNotFoundException = class inherit ArgumentException interface ISerializable
.class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CultureNotFoundException extends System.ArgumentException implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable

summary.span: 当方法尝试构造不可用的区域性时引发的异常。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when a method attempts to construct a culture that is not available.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果最终在方法内尝试构造无效的区域性，则会引发 异常。A exception is thrown whenever the construction of an invalid culture is eventually attempted within a method. 最常见的情况是，在调用以下方法之一无法创建或返回区域性时，会引发此异常：Most commonly, this exception is thrown when a call to one of the following methods fails to create or return a culture: - 构造函数。 constructors. - 方法。The method. - 方法。The method. > [!WARNING] > 在 Windows 7 及更高版本的操作系统上，.NET Framework 从操作系统检索区域性数据。On Windows 7 and later operating systems, the .NET Framework retrieves culture data from the operating system. 如果操作系统找不到该区域性，并且该区域性不是自定义区域性或替换区域性，则会引发 异常。The exception is thrown if the operating system is unable to find the culture, and the culture is not a custom culture or a replacement culture. 如果调用代码尝试使用区域性名称实例化 的对象，则 属性将包含无效名称，并且 属性返回的 对象的 属性为 `false`。If the calling code attempted to instantiate a object by using a culture name, the property contains the invalid name, and the property of the object returned by the property is `false`. 如果调用代码尝试使用区域性标识符来实例化 对象，则 属性返回的 对象的 属性包含无效的标识符， 属性的值为 `null`。If the calling code attempted to instantiate a object by using a culture identifier, the property of the object returned by the property contains the invalid identifier, and the value of the property is `null`. 使用值为0x80070057 的 HRESULT COR_E_ARGUMENT。 uses the HRESULT COR_E_ARGUMENT, which has the value 0x80070057.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用值为0x80070057 的 HRESULT COR_E_ARGUMENT。 uses the HRESULT COR_E_ARGUMENT, which has the value 0x80070057.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用值为0x80070057 的 HRESULT COR_E_ARGUMENT。 uses the HRESULT COR_E_ARGUMENT, which has the value 0x80070057.

summary.span: 使用指定的错误消息初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数使用 `message` 参数的值初始化新实例的 属性。This constructor initializes the property of the new instance using the value of the `message` parameter. `message` 参数的内容应为人所理解。The content of the `message` parameter is intended to be understood by humans. 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture. 使用值为0x80070057 的 HRESULT COR_E_ARGUMENT。 uses the HRESULT COR_E_ARGUMENT, which has the value 0x80070057.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在反序列化期间调用此构造函数以重新构造在流上传输的异常对象。This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.

param.span: 引起当前异常的异常。

param.span: 如果 参数不为空引用，则在处理内部异常的 块中引发当前异常。

summary.span: 使用指定的错误消息和对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用来初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数使用 `message` 参数的值初始化新实例的 属性。This constructor initializes the property of the new instance using the value of the `message` parameter. `message` 参数的内容应为人所理解。The content of the `message` parameter is intended to be understood by humans. 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture. 作为前一个异常的直接结果引发的异常应在 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 属性将返回传递给构造函数的同一值；如果 属性不向构造函数提供内部异常值，则返回 `null`。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.

summary.span: 获取找不到的区域性标识符。

span.span: Gets the culture identifier that cannot be found.
The invalid culture identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果调用代码尝试使用无效的区域性标识符来实例化或检索 对象，则 属性返回的 对象的 属性包含无效的标识符。If the calling code attempted to instantiate or retrieve a object by using an invalid culture identifier, the property of the object returned by the property contains the invalid identifier. 否则，将 `false`其 属性。Otherwise, its property is `false`.
